title: Login Issue
description: User is unable to log in even after entering correct username and password. The system keeps showing an authentication error message which prevents access to the dashboard.

title: Payment Failed
description: Payment gateway is rejecting valid card payments from multiple users. Transactions are not completed and users are seeing failure messages after submitting payment details.

title: UI Bug on Dashboard
description: Dashboard widgets overlap with each other on mobile view, making it difficult for users to read information and interact with buttons properly.

title: Password Reset Email Not Sent
description: Users are not receiving password reset emails after submitting their email address. As a result, they are unable to reset their passwords and regain account access.

title: Slow Page Load
description: Website pages take a long time to load during peak hours. This causes poor user experience and increases bounce rate significantly.

title: Profile Update Error
description: Users are unable to save updated profile information such as name, phone number, or address. An error message appears after clicking the save button.

title: Notification Not Working
description: Push notifications are not being delivered to usersâ€™ devices. Important alerts and updates are being missed as a result.

title: File Upload Failed
description: Large files fail to upload to the server. Upload process stops midway or shows a server error, especially for files above the size limit.

title: Incorrect Invoice
description: Generated invoices show incorrect tax calculations. The total amount does not match the expected value, causing confusion for customers.

title: Search Not Returning Results
description: Search feature does not return any results even when valid keywords are entered. Users are unable to find products or information.

title: Email Verification Link Expired
description: Email verification links expire too quickly. Users often find the link invalid before they get a chance to verify their email address.

title: Data Sync Issue
description: Data is not syncing properly between the mobile application and the web application. Changes made on one platform do not appear on the other.

title: Broken Link
description: Help center link redirects users to a 404 error page. Users are unable to access support documentation or FAQs.

title: Logout Automatically
description: Users are being logged out automatically after a few minutes of inactivity, even when they are actively using the application.
